alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 17 at 12:50PM EST until December 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast South Carolina, including the following areas, Charleston, Inland Berkeley and Tidal Berkeley. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding will also occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread heavy rains will continue through early mid afternoon as a strong nor`easter impacts the region. Rainfall amounts of 4 to 7 inches and locally higher can be expected. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
